description: This is a small beach noone knows and noone ever is. Perfekt for deeptalks with friends, swimming or chilling

name: Death scare / Todesangst
description: This bench is hard to find but the view and the loneliness is worth the way but be careful

name: Bench "Schöne Aussicht"
description: This bench is way up high in the mountains. Thats why its very lonely and you wont be disturbed here. The perfect place to enjoy the sunset on the horizon which you can perfectly see while sitting on the bench. But be aware you need to go down all the way again. To find it, follow the "Schöne Aussicht" signs on the trail

name: Plesseturm
description: Der Plesseturm ist ein herrlicher Aussichtspunkt über den gesamten Werra-Meißner-Kreis und das perfekte Ziel für Wanderungen. Durch seine Geschichte und der Lage gilt er neben dem Wanfrieder Hafen als eines der Aushängeschilder der Stadt und verbindet Ost und West.
